text:
I have before + still do but I was never really a fan of the title VA since they’re really essentially a part-time team member. 

Title aside though, it was mostly their ability to keep to consistently complete work. We are remote so they can work throughout the day but as long as they’re able to do the amount of work set out for them every day and don’t procrastinate to the end of the week or have good/bad periods, I’m pretty happy :) 

I’ve hired them to help with prospecting for content promotion, customer support, community management (for clients) etc. 

Happy to answer to other questions via DM if you’d like, wishing her all the best!
